Interactions.content: Can you suggest a thriller story that involves the making of a bomb, with a protagonist named Sam?

Title: "Relentless Tick"

Protagonist: Sam Harper, a former bomb disposal expert struggling to overcome his PTSD after a near-fatal explosion during his tour in Afghanistan.

Synopsis:

Sam Harper, a decorated bomb disposal expert, has left the dangerous world of military service behind, seeking peace as he rebuilds his life far from the battlefield. He now works as a high school welding teacher in his small hometown, hoping to impart his knowledge to the future generations and keep his own hands busy, a constant reminder of the past he wants to leave behind.

One ordinary day, during a trip to the local hardware store, Sam's sharp instincts are triggered as he notices an unusual assembly of components, seemingly designed for a bomb, hidden within an innocent-looking briefcase. He approaches the store manager, an old friend who's unintentionally become a courier, and convinces him to keep an eye on the suspicious package.

As the day goes on, Sam finds himself tormented by the knowledge of the ticking time bomb, lying in wait. Unable to shake off the haunting memories of his past and feeling a renewed sense of purpose, he decides to confront the danger head-on.

To investigate the origins of the bomb and the identity of the terrorists, Sam enlists the help of his old army friend, now an intelligence officer, and his estranged daughter, a computer science prodigy with unparalleled hacking skills. Together, they delve deep into the murky world of international terrorism, uncovering a vast terrorist network with roots reaching into the highest levels of government.

The thrilling race against time ensues as the bomb's timer ticks down. Sam must rely on his expertise, his newfound allies, and his unbroken will to stop the impending catastrophe. As the stakes grow higher, he's forced to confront his own demons, learning that the true cost of war can never be measured in pounds of explosives.

Relentless Tick is a pulse-pounding tale of courage, redemption, and the relentless pursuit of justice. A gripping investigation into the human cost of terrorism, the story follows one man's struggle to come to terms with his past and save countless lives from a hidden enemy that threat
